detail_desc: Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend. Round neck with a press-stud and decorative buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend. Round neck with a press-stud and decorative buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Dress shirt in woven fabric with a matching pre-tied bow tie in satin. Collar, bib front with pin-tucks, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a wide, square neckline, seam under the bust, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. Elastication with a frill trim around the top and sleeves.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2 cm to 5 cm.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Three-strand metal necklace decorated with metal pendants and glass beads. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains decorated with metal pendants. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Wide blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Wide, 3/4-length balloon sleeves, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared lower section.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, padded, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Straight-style blouse in airy, softly draping, textured-knit jersey with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs.

Straight-style blouse in airy, softly draping, textured-knit jersey with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs.

Jacket in soft fleece with sections in woven fabric on the hood and chest. Fleece-lined hood with a high collar and a zip down the front. Chest pocket, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with ventilating holes under the arms. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.

Boiler suit in airy cotton denim with a resort collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves and cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and back pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs.

Boiler suit in airy cotton denim with a resort collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves and cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and back pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a collar and button placket. Rib trims around the sleeves and wide ribbing at the hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a collar and button placket. Rib trims around the sleeves and wide ribbing at the hem.

Spacious handbag in imitation suede and imitation leather with two handles with a metal chain section and a magnetic press-stud fastener at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 9x31x39 cm.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top of the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
